recipe.title: Basil Pecan Pesto
ingredients: 2 cups packed fresh basil leaves, washed well and spun dry
1/2 cup pecans, toasted golden brown and cooled
2 large garlic cloves, chopped and mashed to a paste with 1/2 teaspoon salt
instructions: In a food processor blend together all ingredients with salt and pepper to taste until smooth.(Pesto keeps, surface covered with plastic wrap, chilled, 1 week.)
